On Sat, 2005-06-18 at 14:37, David Goodwin wrote:
> File cantera-1.6.0.tar.gz has been released.  If you are using Cantera 
> on linux/unix/Mac OSX, I recommend that you upgrade to this release.  
> On a Mac, I have verified that everything runs: 'make test' succeeds, 
> and all Python and MATLAB demos run. Under linux, 'make test' succeeds 
> and the Python demos work, but I currently do not have access to a 
> linux machine with MATLAB installed, so I can't build and test the 
> MATLAB toolbox.

Hello Dave,
  
My Linux SuSE8.3 installation problem was solved when I defined
HAS_NUMERIC to 1  in the config.h file. Somehow it was left undefined.
Now install and make test worked with python modules as well.
I could not get configure to set that var correctly even after I
installed python2.4 and numeric. Earlier try was python2.3.4.

Regards,
-osman
